member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.FullTrustProcessLauncher
member.summary: Activate the full-trust Win32 component of an application from a Universal Windows app component in the same application package.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.FullTrustProcessLauncher.LaunchFullTrustProcessForAppAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Launch the full-trust process for the specified application ID.
member.param: The process relative application identifier of the app whose full trust process component the caller wants to launch. The full-trust process can parse this to determine which app invoked it.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.FullTrustProcessLauncher.LaunchFullTrustProcessForAppAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Launch the full-trust process for the specified application ID, with parameters.
member.param: The process relative application identifier of the app whose full trust process component the caller wants to launch. The full-trust process can parse this to determine which app invoked it.
The parameter group ID for the parameters that will be passed to the launched process.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.FullTrustProcessLauncher.LaunchFullTrustProcessForCurrentAppAsync
member.summary: Launch the full-trust process for the current application ID.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.FullTrustProcessLauncher.LaunchFullTrustProcessForCurrentAppAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Launch the full-trust process for the current application ID, with parameters.
member.param: The parameter group ID for the parameters that will be passed to the launched process.
